full_summary:
**Announcement Tender Title and Details**
Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment (EVSE) Tender Announcement
**Reference:** APN_NRORPOG
**Publication Date:** June 14, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 24, 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

**Tender Description:**
This is an Advance Procurement Notice (APN) for the supply of Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment (EVSE) with anticipated security requirements. The notice aims to provide interested contractors with the opportunity to begin the sponsorship request process for potentially obtaining the required security clearance(s) that are anticipated.

The successful contractor will be responsible for supplying EVSE, data network services, and a web-based platform to view, track, analyze, and report all collected EVSE data. The services also include, but are not limited to, maintenance, warranty, and support to the Department of National Defence (DND) and contractors during the deployment, installation, and commissioning of the EVSE and Data network.

**Security Requirements:**
To be eligible for contract award, a contractor will be required to hold all required security clearance(s) at the time of closing, as further detailed in the solicitation documents. The required security clearance(s) are anticipated to be:

* A valid and active DESIGNATED ORGANIZATION SCREENING (DOS) granted or approved by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) for contractors.

**Trade Agreements:**
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Contact Information:**

* Antoine amRhyn, Regional Service Line Leader, Contract Services, Defence Construction Canada
* Telephone: 613-991-9303
* Email: [Antoine.amRhyn@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Antoine.amRhyn@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)

**Disclaimer:**
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) does not provide any assurances or guarantees that a sponsorship request package or a security clearance application forwarded by DCC to the CSP, PWGSC on behalf of a contractor will be successful or result in the granting of the requested security clearance(s) by the CSP, PWGSC, in a timely fashion.
